original_text: Saul died because he was unfaithful to the Lord; he did not keep the word of the Lord and even consulted a medium for guidance,
korean_text: 사울이 죽은 것은 여호와께 범죄하였기 때문이라 그가 여호와의 말씀을 지키지 아니하고 또 신접한 자에게 가르치기를 청하고

sentences.original_text: because he was unfaithful to the Lord
he did not keep the word of the Lord
and even consulted a medium for guidance
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 심지어 인도를 위해 무당을 상담했다
